title: Zinc
desc:
Post 871
*Did you know that coins in the US are mostly made of zinc?*
- While in hand, combine with another card too form an alloy.
- A card that has combined with this card gains the elemental and gray color, along with the ability to redact itself.
- when a card redacts itself, all that is shown when it plays is [Redacted].
- Any card may attempt to be played. When the card is played, it is revealed to everyone. If the card would not normally be able to be played, it is returned to the owners hand and he must attempt to play another card.
- If the host determines that the players hand cannot play on the card, he must draw two cards and play continues on.
